content.rendered:
Wound Care Management

At ExtremityCare®, we offer a wide range of wound care products that are intended to be used as wound coverings.

*Product images simulated

Restorigin™ is a dual layer amniotic membrane for homologous use only.

Proprietary processing techniques are used to maintain the intrinsic characteristics of the placental tissue.

The tissue is minimally manipulated and is delivered at ambient temperature with a 2-year shelf life.

Restorigin™ is intended for homologous only. It serves as a covering for acute and chronic wounds.

Learn more

*Conceptual, rendered picture of completeFT™

*Product images simulated

completeFT™ is our next generation placental membrane intended for homologous use only.

A multi-layer graft processed with an advanced proprietary processing technology to ensure that all naturally occurring components of each layer of the placental tissue remains intact.

completeFT™ is a Full Thickness graft, containing the Amnion, the Intermediate / Spongy layer as well as the Chorion layer of the placenta. The tissue is minimally manipulated and is delivered at ambient temperature with a 5-year shelf life.

completeFT™ serves as a covering for acute and chronic wounds.

Learn more

*Conceptual, rendered picture of barrera™

barrera™ is a dual layer amniotic membrane intended for homologous use only.

Proprietary processing techniques are used to maintain the intrinsic characteristics of the placental tissue.

The tissue is minimally manipulated and is delivered at ambient temperature with a 2-year shelf life. barrera™ serves as a covering for acute and chronic wounds.

Learn more

*Conceptual, rendered picture of carePATCH™

carePATCH™ is a dual layer amniotic membrane intended for homologous use only.

Proprietary processing techniques are used to maintain the intrinsic characteristics of the placental tissue.

The tissue is minimally manipulated and is delivered at ambient temperature with a 2-year shelf life.

carePATCH™ serves as a covering for acute and chronic wounds.

Learn more

*Product images simulated

Resolve Matrix™ is a thin, flexible, yet strong acellular biologic dermal substitute which support tissue repair. It is uniquely derived from porcine peritoneum membrane and processed using the Optrix™ tissue cleansing methodology, which is optimized to remove antigens while preserving desirable tissue properties and components.

Both its source material and unique cleansing process provide a combination of highly desirable attributes that are appreciated during its clinical application and supporting role in the healing of wounds.

Learn more

*Conceptual, rendered picture of Coll-e-Derm™

 

*Product images simulated

Coll-e-Derm™ is a pre-hydrated human acellular dermal matrix with a sterility assurance level (SAL) of 10-6.

Coll-e-Derm™ is treated with a gentle decellularization process that retains structural integrity, mechanical strength, and collagen stability substantially similiar to the native dermis.

Learn more

Restorigin™ is intended for homologous only. It serves as a covering for acute and chronic wounds.

Extremity Care LLC, makes no claims concerning the biological properties of any product or potential outcomes as a result of the use of any product. Information on this site is provided for informational purposes only and is not meant to substitute for any advice provided by your own physician of other medical professional. The results may not necessarily occur in all individuals. Extremity Care LLC is providing this website and its contents on an “as is” basis and makes no representations or warranties of any kind with respect to this site or its contents. All tissues have been collected, processed, stored and distributed in compliance with FDA regulations governing HCT/Ps.


None of the statements on this website have been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA).
